website_summaries.verdict: Promising to supply sufficient support to the running contender, the Gel Kayano 27 from Asics features an advanced cushioning system. The stability shoe, with its integrated technologies and componentry, yields optimal comfort and performance, making it an ideal running platform for runners participating in both competitive and non-competitive activities. With the flexibility it offers, the natural roll of the foot is encouraged.
pros: Numerous reviewers hail the glove-like fit of the Asics Gel Kayano 27
According to various runners, the shoe provides ample stability
There is enough room for natural toe splay, commended several users
The road running shoe is very comfortable, stated a few purchasers
Some wearers have observed that the platform is very bouncy
For some commenters, the shoe is highly durable
It allows for smooth transitions, lauded multiple customers
cons: The running shoe has a tight midfoot wrap, expressed a few racers
A number of buyers have observed that the shoe is rather bulky
There is too much exterior reinforcement, shared a couple of critics

customer_reviews.title: Hurts your toes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal Asics Gel-Kayano customer for the last decade. The 25 model was fantastic, lasted me over a year and felt great from the moment I put them on until the moment I retired them. Why mess with the formula? Walking and running are extremely important exercises to feel comfortable doing. I skipped the 26 model, and waited for the 27. The toe box on 27 is made of a cheap material that folds inwards, cuts into my big toes and causes blisters. The shoe looks great, but if I'm going to spend a small fortune for a top of the line running shoe, it better feel great, too.
customer_reviews.author: New York Brother

customer_reviews.title: WAY TOO SMALL! DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I have had Kayano 20 thru 25, always size 13 4E (Extra Wide). The overall fit on those 6 models was not always the same, but at least they were consistent over time. Then came the 26, and it was way way too small. And now the 27 is a bad joke. It feels like a tight compressor around my feet. 26 and 27 are MASSIVE FAILS, so it's time to try a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Angel de Las Casas

customer_reviews.title: Get the Gel-Kayano 26s, not the 27s.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes hurt your feet and they get worn out really easily. I've owned many different versions of the Gel-Kayanos over the years and these are the worst ones I've owned. I wish I returned them when I still had the chance. Something is wrong with the toe area and the arch hurts my feet. I've never had that happen with other Gel-Kayano versions, so I think the 27s have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Smerf

customer_reviews.title: Finally....comfort
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit a little tight yet; are very comfortable. Can never got wrong with Kayano’s - exceptional material and stability all in one
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: ASICS changed Manufacturers!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time ASICS Gel Kayano fan. I just bought the new 27 model after having the 25 and there is a material difference in the fit and finish of the shoe. The shoe doesn't fit the same. My foot is tight through the width and my toes are cramped. Also, the shoelaces are too short to properly tie! I noticed my 25's were made in China and the 27's in Vietnam. ASICS definitely changed the manufacturer and the quality has suffered. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inspection crew dropped the ball
customer_reviews.text: When you put it on the crease it’s very noticeable the contour support is not there as in the other shoe I tried to rescue it by placing a piece of light cardboard but it doesn’t work . I’m a Fanatic about the brand sooooooooo there
customer_reviews.author: Mario Dazza

customer_reviews.title: An active senior's all-around sport shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Originally fitted and purchased years ago at a shop specializing in equipment for dedicated runners. I replace every year with the newest model and continue to appreciate the fit, style and cushioning for an active senior. My preferred color is easier to find on Amazon and paid one extra dollar in order to buy from Asics in order to know that I'm buying the real thing instead of a knock-off.
customer_reviews.author: Robert9

customer_reviews.title: Kayano 27s are great, with one issue
customer_reviews.text: I've used Gel Kayanos for over 10 years, and the 27s are a great improvement over the 26s. I also really like the colors of the Lite-Show version. My wife even noticed and said how sharp they looked. HOWEVER, Asics put the wrong sized laces onto these shoes! I can barely tie them because they're so short. I have another pair of 27s that have normal sized laces. Not sure how that happened, but that's a very annoying mistake! And getting in touch with Asics customer service is very difficult to get a new pair of laces.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Panz

customer_reviews.title: Everyday comfort for the unexpected!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these fee great. I wear them everyday, but I originally got them for all-terrain daily running. But these are so nice, I wear them everyday. Good grip and durability. The toe tip design makes it a bit hectic and can get caught on a root and cause injury in you’re tired when trying to avoid a root. So I would recommend these for for everyday and normal running to light trail.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Tiny!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are tiny! I checked a US size to Euro size conversion table, and the US size 10s I bought should have matched Euro 44. The old Gel Kayano size 10s I have on right now match that size, and they say so on the label inside the shoes. The new ones I just received say on their label that size 10 = Euro 42. According to the conversion chart, that equals US size 8 1/2! And that seemed about right when I tried them on, or rather tried to try them on. I couldn’t even get them on my feet! So these bad boys are on their way back to the warehouse. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: H. Cormier

customer_reviews.title: My first defective pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Asics running shoes since 2011 and they have always been perfection. This particular pair must be defective. There is a minor hump in the outside left sole of the shoe toward the front which is causing pain when worn for a long period of time. I've contacted Asics directly for a resolution. These particular shoes are the all-black, size 12.5.
customer_reviews.author: slngsht

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. I have been wearing Asics for many years (Kinsai, Quantum Gel 360, etc). Along with these, I also ordered a new pair of the Quantum 360s. I suffer from foot drop in my right foot and often catch my toe while walking (especially on thick carpet or uneven surfaces). Wearing the new Quantum 360s I caught my toe 4 times in a 5 minute walk. Over the 2 month I have had the Kayano 27, I have not once caught my toe and tripped. I like them so much I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Techy guy

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: i bought these and some brooks to compare.... the ascis are about 30.00 more than the brooks and I didnt see enough diff for the extra 30.00 however these are solid shoes, super comfortable, and great support. Negative.. other than the black, i am not a fan of the colors they have.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Decent to Good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoes. They are comfortable but unless you have a narrow foot shaped like a 2x4 stud, you may want to consider the 'wide' version.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kimura

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoe but.....
customer_reviews.text: Nice running shoe. The only thing is when you bend your toe the tip of the shoe right where the big toe is creases in and touches it when you walk. Im hoping this goes away when it breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A

customer_reviews.title: Great long distance runner's shoe
customer_reviews.text: My new pair. I think I have purchased the last 10 changes. Fit great. Super comfort. Live the bounce feel when I run in them.
customer_reviews.author: SG1957

customer_reviews.title: This is my second shopping experience with Amazon Asics.
customer_reviews.text: Order one week, I received it at noon on Wednesday today! I originally planned to wait for kayano 27 platinum to be listed before buying, finally considering that this red running shoe is easier to match with clothes and pants, so like the picture, it's great! I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: xinghuang

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful support for running
customer_reviews.text: I have high arches and this running shoe makes it more comfortable to run longer distances. Running on asphalt for 5 miles seemed as easy as a 3 mile with different running shoes. The Kayano 27 supports my feet well without fatiguing my calves as I run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective Asics Kayano 27
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes excited only to be Dissatisfied with DEFECTIVE MENS ASICS KAYANO 27. My worst nightmare come true. Then they take months to Refund your money and often refuse to!! They are the Pitts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Slip

customer_reviews.title: Poor Shoe - Causes Blisters
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal Kayano customer. That being said, this is probably the worst model that I have purchased. After only about a month and a half since purchase, the material around the toe box is folding and causing blisters. Since I'm paying $160 for a pair of running shoes, I expect them to hold up much better than mentioned above. As you can see from other reviews, there seems to be others that are experiencing the same problem. I would like to process a return.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great Shies for Workouts
customer_reviews.text: Had previous models of the same shoe. These so far are just as great. 5 stars. Good for running on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: John Richard

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest
customer_reviews.text: Asics is my son's favorite shoes. He uses it to school, work, run. He also likes the looks of it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: New Graphics ?
customer_reviews.text: I have never had any bad products or fit from Asics. Been a runner for 38 plus years. Wish the 2020 Gel Kayano 27 in black had a better graphic pattern like the GT 2000 8 in black. I bought both models still.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Low

customer_reviews.title: Improved over last year.
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement from last years (26) model. These fit accordingly, Where as the last model was tight.
customer_reviews.author: D. L.

customer_reviews.title: Short laces, pinching toe
customer_reviews.text: Laces are too short. Toe material pinches when bending at the toe. I have been an Asics buyer for a long time. This is my first disappointing shoe I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded Model???? Not so!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4E width so finding shoes is very difficult for me. The Gel Kayano 27 doesn’t seem to fit as well as my Gel Kayano 25. Support is lacking and width doesn’t appear to be as advertised. Very disappointed with this model. Wished I could get another couple of pairs of Gel Kayano 25 12.5 length with 4E width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASICS comfort as usual
customer_reviews.text: Accent colors look more like a very dark blue than black. Fits great, comfortable
customer_reviews.author: MT601

customer_reviews.title: Total Knee Replacement support!
customer_reviews.text: FITS well, good support for my feet and knees. Bought them as recommended by my surgeon and therapist for TKR patients.
customer_reviews.author: Rehd Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of sneaker for $160
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive shoe which I got so I could start running - but very little cushion in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Light & comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. While these shoes are running shoes, I use them for working out. They are very comfortable & light. If you like ASICS shoes, you will love these. Best pair yet.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Guerra, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes and has gotten ton's of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: The best running shoe ever...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the comfort, the fit and I sm extremely satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Laces weirdly short
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly the laces are about 6” shorter than any prior model
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: I like that they don’t hurt my ankles, I have a few Nike’s and they for some reason are too tight and rub my ankles. ASICS fit my foot the best. Have several pairs of ASIC tennis shoes and they are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for running/walking.
customer_reviews.text: Regular size. Very comfortable for street running/walking, a little wide at the front, helps avoid missteps on the road. I got it in black, and it is a bit more than expected as the ASICS sides are also black. There is nothing to contrast with. In all a good, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: alfred

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a 2nd pair in white
customer_reviews.text: On my feet all day and this is a Very comfortable shoe. Has helped eliminate heal pain
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Kayano 27 for Plantar Fasciitis
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit very well, and are very comfortable. Bought them specifically to help with plantar fasciitis. Pain is greatly reduced while wearing them. Just waiting to see if they will be as effective as reviewed in curing the condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in MN

customer_reviews.title: They fit, width & length, happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 1 week early, thx Amazon! Perfect fit, comfortable but a bit ugly... Not as stylish as NB.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & joy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ASICS for my brother & he says that they are comfortable. He is diabetic & these sneakers are what he needs for comfort. He highly recommends them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Duran

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great seller!
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal shoes for wide feet!! Very comfortable, I wear them daily for work, excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Great overall cross trainer. A bit wider thank I would like. But nothing I can’t live with.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Reflective and stable
customer_reviews.text: White and neon - good reflective pieces for low light runs. So few shoes add reflective parts these days. Good fit and stable shoe as always for Kayano.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Assics Rocks
customer_reviews.text: My last three pair of running shoes have been Assics and this last one is every bit as good as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Rontal

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Runs narrow. Shoe fit, sizing, varies, depending on country of manufacture. Other Kayano 27’s fit true to size. The “MX” doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are exactly what my husband wanted. Fit and look as imagined.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Trout

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoe look ,fit and feel AWESOME. I bought 12w and fit perfect. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Daddy3

customer_reviews.title: No good for plantar faciatis
customer_reviews.text: I Have plantar faciatis so definitely dont work for me
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Stop what you're doing and buy these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Asics shoes are some of the best out there. The price tag might be scary but I promise you that it's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: william smith

customer_reviews.title: ASICS! Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for walking. I only buy ASICS now. I have knee problems and ASICS is the reason my knees feel great!
customer_reviews.author: william shields III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very little bedding in required. Great shoe. So comfortable and supportive
customer_reviews.author: Graham D Potter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for running, and couldn’t be more pleased with the product. It’s like running on the clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Samson Petrosyan

customer_reviews.title: Great running sneaker, i havent been buying these since 2005
customer_reviews.text: Running shoe fits good went with the wide selection thus time, definetly fits better
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Shipped Early
customer_reviews.text: As always I like the ASICS fits and feels. And the shoes arrived a day early
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Never thought that gear makes big difference for running, but those are game-changers
customer_reviews.author: Andrey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Bought a size US13 and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Kayano 27 Running Shoes, 9.5M, Sheet Rock/Magnetic Blue
product_meta.description: Enjoy excellent comfort and advanced support with the GEL-KAYANO 27 running shoe. The redesigned mesh upper helps keep feet cool, while the sole is more flexible to help promote a more natural roll through the gait cycle. This starts in the heel with added flex grooves that assist in isolating initial impact to force a softer and smoother feeling at footstrike. At midstance, the foot should stop pronating and re-supinate for an efficient toe-off. To help this natural motion, we incorporate DYNAMIC DUOMAX technology to help support the foot and increase stability for runners whose feet roll inward too much (overpronate). The midsole also integrates SPACE TRUSSTIC technology, which provides stability and reduces the overall weight to help promote a smoother transition from foot strike to toe-off. This added stability is complemented by deeper forefoot flex grooves for a smoother roll through toe-off, allowing the shoe to move more naturally with the foot. Lastly, a large section of reflective materials in the rearfoot helps keep runners visible when running in low-light conditions. The GEL-KAYANO 27 model is an excellent choice for both competitive and noncompetitive runners looking for an everyday trainer that combines comfort with support.
feature_bullets: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Technology Cushioning System - Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
FlyteFoam Propel Technology - ASICS energetic foam formulation that provides supreme bounce thanks to a unique elastomer compound.

FlyteFoam Midsole Technology - Our FlyteFoam technology provides exceptional bounce back and responsiveness no matter the distance, utilizing organic super fibers to help reduce packing out that traditionally happens with softer, low density foams.
Dynamic DuoMax Support System - This evolution of DuoMax system enhances stability and support, with reduced weight and increased platform support.
Engineered Mesh Upper - Multi-directional mesh material improves ventilation and stability.
